mapper.select: SELECT CHE_RES_NO AS challengeNo, CHE_TITLE AS challengeTitle, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startDate, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, THUMBNAIL AS thumbnail FROM CHELLAGE_RES ORDER BY ABS(TRUNC(END_DATE) - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) ASC

SELECT cb.CHELLANGE_NO, cb.MEMBER_NO, cr.CHE_RES_NO, cr.CHE_TITLE RES_CHE_TITLE, cb.CHE_TITLE, cb.CHE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(cb.CHE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHE_DATE, cb.COMMENT_COUNT, m.NICKNAME FROM CHELLAGE_BOARD cb JOIN CHELLAGE_RES cr on cr.CHE_RES_NO = cb.CHE_RES_NO JOIN MEMBER m on cb.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE cr.CHE_RES_NO = #{cno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHELLAGE_RES cr JOIN CHELLAGE_BOARD cb on cr.CHE_RES_NO = cb.CHE_RES_NO WHERE cr.che_res_no = #{cno}
